bio.description: Loves to do food reviews and taste new types of food. Loves to eat chicken, barbecue. Loves to eat at 24 Chicken and Tinuhog ni Benny

posts.caption: 24 Chicken
posts.description: I was honestly blown away by how well they manage the chicken. I love the chickens there and my favorite flavors there are the Jack Daniels and 24 Cheddar chicken.

comments.author: Kirin
comments.comment: Jack Daniels din favorite ko diyan
